reviews.review: What an amazing game for it's time. There are still people playing online as well. I don't see much of reason to play this version if you have Source but it's still worth adding to your collection.

A timeless classic, being well over 20 years and still receiving tweaks and patches with occassional  small but new content. With Half-Life: Alyx scheduled to release next year, this is what started it all and redefined the FPS genre. A true Labor of Love indeed !

-calentar la jarra durante algunos minutos, llen√°ndola de agua caliente.

-poner en la m√°quina la cantidad correcta de agua y extraer.

Un consejo: no conservar el caf√© en las jarras de vidrio que quedan apoyadas en la fuente de calor, ya que le dan al caf√© un desagradable sabor a quemado.

Preparaci√≥n y cebado del Mate üßâ
- Ponemos el agua a calentar y la apartamos del fuego antes de que entre en ebullici√≥n (en lo posible la ponerla en un termo para que no pierda la temperatura).
- Llenamos hasta las 3/4 parte del mate con yerba.
- Tapamos el mate con la mano, lo damos vuelta y golpeamos suavemente la base para que el polvillo de la yerba quede en la superficie.  
- Mojamos la bombilla con agua e introducimos en az√∫car para que se impregne bien, dicen que de esta manera no se tapa.
- Luego inclinamos el mate unos 45 ¬∫ e introducir la bombilla hasta el final removiendo la yerba hasta ubicarla en el medio.
- Si se desea tomarlo dulce, introducir una cucharadita de az√∫car dej√°ndola caer sobre el extremo de la bombilla.
- Luego verter el agua suavemente sobre el costadito de la bombilla hasta que la superficie se llene de espuma .
- Despu√©s de unos segundos el agua ser√° absorbida por la yerba y va a bajar su nivel, asi que volvemos a poner m√°s agua hasta llegar nuevamente al tope.

[u][b]Plot[/b][/u]: It is your 1st day of work in the laboratory, [i]‚ÄòBlack Mesa‚Äô[/i], and they have held an experiment that they would like you to be a part of. They have told you all you need to know about the experiment except leaving out all the details regarding [i]‚Äòwhat could go wrong?‚Äô[/i]. During the experiment, everything goes to hell, from high electrical-currents to a portal being created to an alien world known as [i]‚ÄòXen‚Äô[/i]. Throughout the game, you fight these different types of alien creatures with the hopes of somehow closing the portal or killing everything that comes your way.

[u][b]Gameplay[/b][/u]: It is an old game, but the graphics still aren‚Äôt the worst. They are playable and quite enjoyable as well. The main focus of the game is still the plot because they couldn‚Äôt have done a whole lot with how the game looked. You can enjoy shooting everything that comes your way or using the famous [i]‚Äòcrowbar'[/i] to mow down your enemies.

[u][b]Characters[/b][/u]: The main character is [i]‚ÄòGordon Freeman‚Äô[/i], or better known for according to MatPat, [i]‚ÄúMIT grad with the most absurd doctoral thesis title imaginable observation of Einstein-Podolsky-Rosen entanglement on super quantum structures by induction through the nonlinear transient crystal of extremely long wavelength low pulse from mode-locked source array‚Äù[/i]. We also see one of those shady characters who always have a suit on, [i]‚ÄòThe G. Man‚Äô[/i], who stalks you from the corners throughout the game. 

[b][u]Why should you play Half-Life[/u]?[/b]
Well, as the saying goes, [i]‚ÄúOld, but God‚Äù[/i]. That‚Äôs a complete representation of Half-Life. It‚Äôs a memorable experience to have. Where not everything is about how the game [i]‚Äòlooks‚Äô[/i], but how the story [i]‚Äòprogresses‚Äô[/i]. It‚Äôs a good feeling to have, knowing you have played and completed this magnificent series. A series that may as well be considered one of the best in all of gaming. However, the concept of good will be nothing more than one‚Äôs own opinion.
